topic.title: 206.001-70 Exception for prototype projects for follow-on production contracts.

body.p: (a) Also excepted from this part are follow-on production contracts for products developed pursuant to the “other transactions” authority of 10 U.S.C. 4022 for prototype projects when—
(1) The other transaction solicitation and agreement included provisions for a follow-on production contract; and

(2) The contracting officer receives sufficient documentation from the agreements officer of the other transaction agreement for the prototype project that the requirements of 10 U.S.C.4022 sections (f)(2)(A) and (B) and, when applicable, section (a)(2), have been met.
